Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The unit is strategically located in a prominent position on the A23 Purley Way, one
of Croydonâ€™s most established and sought after industrial and retail areas. 214
Purley Way is located 10 miles south of Central London and 6 miles north of J7 of
the M25/M23 motorways.




West Croydon Station is 1.3 miles away and Waddon Marsh Tram Stop is 0.3 miles
away, providing regular services to East Croydon and Wimbledon. Purley Way also
benefits from numerous bus routes.

Prologis Park Beddington will deliver 6 new industrial and logistics units, offering flexible opportunities from 13,820 - 146,120 sq ft.

All units will be ready for occupation in Q2 2021 with the opportunity of early access for fit-out to get you up and running without delay. 

For maximum flexibility, DC2 can be leased as three individual units or as two or three units combined.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: THE PLACE TO BE FOR INDUSTRIAL AND LOGISTICS IN SOUTH LONDON

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Thornton Road Industrial Estate is located just off Thornton Road (A23) in Croydon, a well-established industrial location. The estate is located immediately North of the Purley Way. The A23 links Central London (8 miles) with the M25 Junction 7 (10 miles) providing access to the national motorway network. Ampere Way Tram Station is approximately 10 minutes from the site, providing access to London Overground services at East Croydon Station (10 minutes), Mitcham Junction (8 minutes) and Wimbledon (20 minutes).

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unit 6 Thornton Road Industrial Estate, Thornton Road, Croydon, CR0 3BT
